original:
So you're ^P? I've 
heard of you from Hiroyuki.
My name's Kizuna. Nice to 
meet you.
I'll take you to Hiroyuki so you can
see each other again.
translation:
So you're ^P? I've 
heard of you from Hiroyuki.
My name's Kizuna. Nice to 
meet you.
I'll take you to Hiroyuki so you can
see each other again.

original:
So you're the one Hiroyuki's been
talking about, ^P?
The name's Shuu, nice to meet you.

I'll take you to Hiroyuki so you guys
can catch up!
translation:
So you're the one Hiroyuki's been
talking about, ^P?
The name's Shuu, nice to meet you.

I'll take you to Hiroyuki so you guys
can catch up!

original:
This is where we live. It's called
Tamer Town.
translation:
This is where we live. It's called
Tamer Town.

original:
This is Tamer Town, it's where we
live.
translation:
This is Tamer Town, it's where we
live.

original:
It's called 'Tamer Town', but I'm
the only Tamer here now.
There used to be a bunch of us 
a long time ago, but not anymore.
translation:
It's called 'Tamer Town', but I'm
the only Tamer here now.
There used to be a bunch of us 
a long time ago, but not anymore.

original:
Though it's called Tamer Town, 
there aren't any other Tamers left.
There used to be a lot of them a
long time ago, though.
translation:
Though it's called Tamer Town, 
there aren't any other Tamers left.
There used to be a lot of them a
long time ago, though.

original:
This place was wrought with 
waves of Selectors attacking.
They stole everyone's Digivices, and
captured Tamers never returned.
Over time, one by one, everyone
just disappeared...
translation:
This place was wrought with 
waves of Selectors attacking.
They stole everyone's Digivices, and
captured Tamers never returned.
Over time, one by one, everyone
just disappeared...

original:
We suffered waves of constant
attacks by the Selectors...
They took Digivices, and anyone
who left never returned.
Eventually, over time, everyone
was gone...
translation:
We suffered waves of constant
attacks by the Selectors...
They took Digivices, and anyone
who left never returned.
Eventually, over time, everyone
was gone...

original:
Oh... I'm sorry. I ended up going 
off on a a depressing tangent...
Hiroyuki's here somewhere,
why don't you go find him?
translation:
Oh... I'm sorry. I ended up going 
off on a a depressing tangent...
Hiroyuki's here somewhere,
why don't you go find him?

original:
Ah, sorry, I didn't mean to bring
up something so depressing...
Hiroyuki's around here somewhere,
how about you go take a look?
translation:
Ah, sorry, I didn't mean to bring
up something so depressing...
Hiroyuki's around here somewhere,
how about you go take a look?

original:
This place has lots of stores,
too. Be sure to check them out.
translation:
This place has lots of stores,
too. Be sure to check them out.

original:
There are a bunch of different 
stores here to check out, too.
translation:
There are a bunch of different 
stores here to check out, too.

original:
If you get lost, don't hesitate to
ask someone, alright?
translation:
If you get lost, don't hesitate to
ask someone, alright?

original:
If there's anything you don't know,
just ask.
translation:
If there's anything you don't know,
just ask.

original:
I wonder what everyones doing 
right now? I bet Asuka's mad...
translation:
I wonder what everyones doing 
right now? I bet Asuka's mad...

original:
...Well, I'll worry about that
later...
The current problem is how I'm 
going to beat this boredom.
Should I try fishing...? Nah, that's
kinda difficult, I can't be bothered.
translation:
...Well, I'll worry about that
later...
The current problem is how I'm 
going to beat this boredom.
Should I try fishing...? Nah, that's
kinda difficult, I can't be bothered.

original:
...Oh, I just thought of a good
idea!
I'll register a Digimon and let it fish 
for me instead. 
Now, I just need a Digivice...
translation:
...Oh, I just thought of a good
idea!
I'll register a Digimon and let it fish 
for me instead. 
Now, I just need a Digivice...

original: Oh, ^P! You came for me?!
translation: Oh, ^P! You came for me?!

original:
I got really reaaaaally lost, 
you know!
As soon as I got here, a red 
Digimon suddenly chased after me!
I ran away, but ended up getting 
lost and finding this place.
...Hey wait, where's Asuka? Isn't
she with you?
...Huh!? She was kidnapped?!
By who?!
WarGrowlmon and Kuwagamon...?

Could they be... the red Digimon
from before...!?
translation:
I got really reaaaaally lost, 
you know!
As soon as I got here, a red 
Digimon suddenly chased after me!
I ran away, but ended up getting 
lost and finding this place.
...Hey wait, where's Asuka? Isn't
she with you?
...Huh!? She was kidnapped?!
By who?!
WarGrowlmon and Kuwagamon...?

Could they be... the red Digimon
from before...!?

original:
......Hey, ^P.
I came here because I heard a
rumor.
There was a small tamer seen 
arguing with the Selectors.
At a place known as Limit Valley, 
here in South Bridge,
I just had to see... if it was Yui...
That's what caused me to act, but I
just ended up in this sorry state...
So I'm relying on you, ^P!

Could you take me to that 
Limit Valley place?
translation:
......Hey, ^P.
I came here because I heard a
rumor.
There was a small tamer seen 
arguing with the Selectors.
At a place known as Limit Valley, 
here in South Bridge,
I just had to see... if it was Yui...
That's what caused me to act, but I
just ended up in this sorry state...
So I'm relying on you, ^P!

Could you take me to that 
Limit Valley place?

original:
Oh, that reminds me, ^P.

Whenever you want to go back,
here's the DigiPort address.
Be sure to put it in your Digivice,
you got that?
translation:
Oh, that reminds me, ^P.

Whenever you want to go back,
here's the DigiPort address.
Be sure to put it in your Digivice,
you got that?

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i

original:
Alright now! Let's head to Limit
Valley, ^P!
translation:
Alright now! Let's head to Limit
Valley, ^P!

original:
H-hey... wait, ^P?! 
Where are you right now?!
A-A-azu is! Ashuka is! She's-?!
translation:
H-hey... wait, ^P?! 
Where are you right now?!
A-A-azu is! Ashuka is! She's-?!

original:
Whoa now Terriermon, calm down
for a second...
Have you figured out where Asuka
was taken...?
translation:
Whoa now Terriermon, calm down
for a second...
Have you figured out where Asuka
was taken...?

original:
Huh?! Hiroyuki?! Why are you there
with ^P?!
...Forget about that, this is more 
important!
Asuka, she's being targeted...

...By a super scary Digimon!
translation:
Huh?! Hiroyuki?! Why are you there
with ^P?!
...Forget about that, this is more 
important!
Asuka, she's being targeted...

...By a super scary Digimon!

original:
Targeted? By who? And why
Asuka??
I'd get it if they were after 
^P, being the Tamer, but...
translation:
Targeted? By who? And why
Asuka??
I'd get it if they were after 
^P, being the Tamer, but...

original:
I don't understand it, myself! 
But you see, that Digimon...
It's going around beating up red
Digimon...
And then asking each of them for
Asuka's whereabouts!
translation:
I don't understand it, myself! 
But you see, that Digimon...
It's going around beating up red
Digimon...
And then asking each of them for
Asuka's whereabouts!

original:
Things keep getting weirder... Just
what kind of Digimon is this?
translation:
Things keep getting weirder... Just
what kind of Digimon is this?

original:
A scary looking one. It's quite 
fierce towards the other Digimon.
I only have a faint memory of what 
it looks like...
It's super strong! And fast! And 
quite ferocious!
...Hey, ^P! Asuka's in 
real danger, here!
You need to hurry and find her 
before that Digimon does!
translation:
A scary looking one. It's quite 
fierce towards the other Digimon.
I only have a faint memory of what 
it looks like...
It's super strong! And fast! And 
quite ferocious!
...Hey, ^P! Asuka's in 
real danger, here!
You need to hurry and find her 
before that Digimon does!

original:
Alright, got it. Leave it to us, 
Terriermon!
We'll find her and bring her back, 
don't you worry!
translation:
Alright, got it. Leave it to us, 
Terriermon!
We'll find her and bring her back, 
don't you worry!

original:
Yeah! I know that ^P is 
very reliable in that regard!
If you find any new information, 
just contact me, alright?
And Hiroyuki, don't go getting in
^P's way, now!
translation:
Yeah! I know that ^P is 
very reliable in that regard!
If you find any new information, 
just contact me, alright?
And Hiroyuki, don't go getting in
^P's way, now!

original:
Huh?! Oh... Yeah... I'll do my best.

Uhhh... ummm... huh?

Hey now, what's with such a 
difference in tone between us...
It's a little harsh, isn't it? 
^P...?
translation:
Huh?! Oh... Yeah... I'll do my best.

Uhhh... ummm... huh?

Hey now, what's with such a 
difference in tone between us...
It's a little harsh, isn't it? 
^P...?

original: I found you!!!
translation: I found you!!!

original:
You really surprised us, jeez...!
What are you doing around here?!
translation:
You really surprised us, jeez...!
What are you doing around here?!

original:
Where is Asuka?! Who took her,
and where did they go?!?!
What are you planning on doing
to her?!
translation:
Where is Asuka?! Who took her,
and where did they go?!?!
What are you planning on doing
to her?!

original:
Hold on, I have no clue what
you're going on about...
But... you must be that Digimon
Terriermon told us about...!
What do you plan on doing once
you find Asuka?!
translation:
Hold on, I have no clue what
you're going on about...
But... you must be that Digimon
Terriermon told us about...!
What do you plan on doing once
you find Asuka?!

original:
What are you going on about, you
fool!? 
It's not what I'm planning on doing,
it's what you're planning on doing!
translation:
What are you going on about, you
fool!? 
It's not what I'm planning on doing,
it's what you're planning on doing!

original:
Huh...!?

I don't get this at all... Just who 
are you?!
translation:
Huh...!?

I don't get this at all... Just who 
are you?!

original: Who on earth is this Digimon?
translation: Who on earth is this Digimon?

original: The Devimon Asuka knows.
translation: The Devimon Asuka knows.

original: A strange, unknown Digimon.
translation: A strange, unknown Digimon.

original:
I thought as much, this guy sure
is a strange one.
Should we just ignore him...?

But... just how on earth does this
guy know Asuka...?
Don't you think something's off?
translation:
I thought as much, this guy sure
is a strange one.
Should we just ignore him...?

But... just how on earth does this
guy know Asuka...?
Don't you think something's off?

original:
Huh? 'From before'... wait, you 
mean that DemiDevimon?
So it evolved into Devimon, and then
again into VenomMyotismon?
You sure know a lot about Digimon,
^P!
………
………
translation:
Huh? 'From before'... wait, you 
mean that DemiDevimon?
So it evolved into Devimon, and then
again into VenomMyotismon?
You sure know a lot about Digimon,
^P!
………
………

original:
...Wait a minute?!
Then this guy...!
He's searching for Asuka because
he's worried about her?!
You've gotta be kidding me!
translation:
...Wait a minute?!
Then this guy...!
He's searching for Asuka because
he's worried about her?!
You've gotta be kidding me!

original:
Why you...!
I'll send you flying...!!!
translation:
Why you...!
I'll send you flying...!!!

original: Wait, what?! Why?!
translation: Wait, what?! Why?!

original:
So you're the one who's been going
around beating up Digimon?
Just what exactly are you trying to
do?
translation:
So you're the one who's been going
around beating up Digimon?
Just what exactly are you trying to
do?

original:
Shut up, you spineless humans!
What were YOU doing?!
Why didn't you protect her?!
Why didn't you chase after them?!
What are you doing just messing
around out here?!
You need to hurry and go find her,
you brainless idiots!
translation:
Shut up, you spineless humans!
What were YOU doing?!
Why didn't you protect her?!
Why didn't you chase after them?!
What are you doing just messing
around out here?!
You need to hurry and go find her,
you brainless idiots!

original:
...Hey, that was harsh. You don't
need to yell so much.
On top of that, why are you so 
worried about Asuka?
translation:
...Hey, that was harsh. You don't
need to yell so much.
On top of that, why are you so 
worried about Asuka?

original: I don't know!
translation: I don't know!

original: What...?
translation: What...?

original:
I can't answer what I don't know!
What does it matter!?
translation:
I can't answer what I don't know!
What does it matter!?

original:
Now now, there's no need to lash
out...
translation:
Now now, there's no need to lash
out...

original: You just be quiet!
translation: You just be quiet!

original:
I can't count on guys like you! I'll 
search for her myself!
First I need to identify the red 
Digimon who kidnapped her!
So I'm beating up every red 
Digimon that I can find!
If I continue to do that, 
eventually...
Eventually I'll find the one who 
kidnapped Asuka!
translation:
I can't count on guys like you! I'll 
search for her myself!
First I need to identify the red 
Digimon who kidnapped her!
So I'm beating up every red 
Digimon that I can find!
If I continue to do that, 
eventually...
Eventually I'll find the one who 
kidnapped Asuka!

original:
That may be true, but... we already
know who kidnapped her.
It'd be fine if he could just go beat
up WarGrowlmon and Kuwagamon!
It'll be troublesome if he continues
to beat up every red Digimon, huh?
………
translation:
That may be true, but... we already
know who kidnapped her.
It'd be fine if he could just go beat
up WarGrowlmon and Kuwagamon!
It'll be troublesome if he continues
to beat up every red Digimon, huh?
………

original:
Hey, ^P, I just noticed 
something...
...Isn't he also red...?
translation:
Hey, ^P, I just noticed 
something...
...Isn't he also red...?

original:
Priority orders received.
Order is to capture the Numbers.
Under the following reasons:
Stealing a DigiShip.
Destroying the escape pod.
Aiding in Lost Digimon's escape.
Leaking confidential information.
Altering Defrag Data.
And 13 further incidents.
Order is to capture the Numbers.
translation:
Priority orders received.
Order is to capture the Numbers.
Under the following reasons:
Stealing a DigiShip.
Destroying the escape pod.
Aiding in Lost Digimon's escape.
Leaking confidential information.
Altering Defrag Data.
And 13 further incidents.
Order is to capture the Numbers.

original:
Don't act so full of yourselves, 
haven't you figured it out yet?
Once you've lost your usefulness
to them,
You'll be hunted down and erased, 
too, you know?
I'm sure you can recall what 
happened to Numbers 4 through 7?
translation:
Don't act so full of yourselves, 
haven't you figured it out yet?
Once you've lost your usefulness
to them,
You'll be hunted down and erased, 
too, you know?
I'm sure you can recall what 
happened to Numbers 4 through 7?

original:
Number 04, whereabouts unknown.
Number 05, whereabouts unknown.
Number 06, whereabouts unknown.
Number 07, whereabouts unknown.
translation:
Number 04, whereabouts unknown.
Number 05, whereabouts unknown.
Number 06, whereabouts unknown.
Number 07, whereabouts unknown.

original:
Numbers are Numbers,
Erasers are Erasers.
Our job is to simply erase what
is selected for us by the Selectors.
translation:
Numbers are Numbers,
Erasers are Erasers.
Our job is to simply erase what
is selected for us by the Selectors.

original:
So that's how it is, huh?

It appears that the whereabouts
of your brain is also unkown.
translation:
So that's how it is, huh?

It appears that the whereabouts
of your brain is also unkown.

original:
We found you, Bandits! Where are
Yui and Takuto!?
We know you're working together 
with the Selectors!
So just confess and nothing bad
will happen to you!
translation:
We found you, Bandits! Where are
Yui and Takuto!?
We know you're working together 
with the Selectors!
So just confess and nothing bad
will happen to you!

original:
How annoying. I'm getting really 
fed up with all this.
Every last one of you...
translation:
How annoying. I'm getting really 
fed up with all this.
Every last one of you...

original:
We don't have time to mess 
around! Answer me, Bandits!
There was a small Tamer here
fighting the Selectors, right!?
Some of our friends were sure
they saw it!
So where did that small Tamer go!?
translation:
We don't have time to mess 
around! Answer me, Bandits!
There was a small Tamer here
fighting the Selectors, right!?
Some of our friends were sure
they saw it!
So where did that small Tamer go!?

original:
We know someone very well, with
a small body,
Lacking in guts, lacking in ability...

So tell me... Which 'small Tamer'
are you looking for, exactly?
translation:
We know someone very well, with
a small body,
Lacking in guts, lacking in ability...

So tell me... Which 'small Tamer'
are you looking for, exactly?

original: Wait... No... You don't mean...
translation: Wait... No... You don't mean...

original:
That's right, the ones fighting the
Selectors were us.
And the small Tamer they saw was
most probably Tres.
Now enough of your games. Just
go back to your own world already.
I'll even be kind enough to give you
the address, so just get going.
translation:
That's right, the ones fighting the
Selectors were us.
And the small Tamer they saw was
most probably Tres.
Now enough of your games. Just
go back to your own world already.
I'll even be kind enough to give you
the address, so just get going.

original:
We can't just go and leave our 
friends stuck here!
translation:
We can't just go and leave our 
friends stuck here!

original:
Your friends won't be coming
back.
They probably aren't even the 
friends you know, anymore.
You need to leave soon, or you'll
be met with the same fate.
Just stop trying so hard and go
home.
translation:
Your friends won't be coming
back.
They probably aren't even the 
friends you know, anymore.
You need to leave soon, or you'll
be met with the same fate.
Just stop trying so hard and go
home.

original: What...?
translation: What...?

original: H-hey... wait!
translation: H-hey... wait!

original:
I don't really get what he was
going on about, but...
Considering how insistent he was,
there's gotta be something ahead.
Let's go check it out, ^P!
translation:
I don't really get what he was
going on about, but...
Considering how insistent he was,
there's gotta be something ahead.
Let's go check it out, ^P!

original:
I'm warning you now, turn back 
and go home.
I cannot allow anyone to proceed
any further.
translation:
I'm warning you now, turn back 
and go home.
I cannot allow anyone to proceed
any further.

original:
What's with everyone? 'Go home,'
'go back,' 'go away.'
...Hey, wait a minute...

Hey, ^P, that guy looks
familiar...
The Digimon who attacked me in
Palette Amazon...
Could it be this guy...? And the one 
who kidnapped Asuka...
translation:
What's with everyone? 'Go home,'
'go back,' 'go away.'
...Hey, wait a minute...

Hey, ^P, that guy looks
familiar...
The Digimon who attacked me in
Palette Amazon...
Could it be this guy...? And the one 
who kidnapped Asuka...

original:
You're the WarGrowlmon from
before!
translation:
You're the WarGrowlmon from
before!

original:
I must protect this place, under 
orders from my Tamer.
Leave, now. This is the last time I 
will warn you.
translation:
I must protect this place, under 
orders from my Tamer.
Leave, now. This is the last time I 
will warn you.

original:
Leave, you say, but where do you 
expect us to go?
Without our friends, we don't have
anywhere to go back to.
Plus, who exactly is this Tamer
you keep talking about?
translation:
Leave, you say, but where do you 
expect us to go?
Without our friends, we don't have
anywhere to go back to.
Plus, who exactly is this Tamer
you keep talking about?

original:
I have no reason to answer to the
enemy!
translation:
I have no reason to answer to the
enemy!

original: Hey, wait, are you running away?!
translation: Hey, wait, are you running away?!

original:
My Tamer is calling for me...

I don't need to delay you any 
longer.
I'm sure we will fight again 
someday.
When that time comes, I won't go
so easy on you...
translation:
My Tamer is calling for me...

I don't need to delay you any 
longer.
I'm sure we will fight again 
someday.
When that time comes, I won't go
so easy on you...

original:
He doesn't need to delay us 
anymore?
Does he mean him fighting us was
simply a delay tactic?
What on earth is going on? I just
don't have a clue anymore...
translation:
He doesn't need to delay us 
anymore?
Does he mean him fighting us was
simply a delay tactic?
What on earth is going on? I just
don't have a clue anymore...

original:
Takuto?! You're safe!

Hey... Where's Yui? Isn't she with
you?
translation:
Takuto?! You're safe!

Hey... Where's Yui? Isn't she with
you?

original:
She's with me, of course...

I've hidden her in a safe place.
translation:
She's with me, of course...

I've hidden her in a safe place.

original:
Is that so... Thank you for taking
care of her, Takuto!
I bet it's been pretty dangerous 
and scary for you, huh?
translation:
Is that so... Thank you for taking
care of her, Takuto!
I bet it's been pretty dangerous 
and scary for you, huh?

original:
Indeed, I've met with many 
dangerous things.
But I managed to defeat every last
one of them.
Me...
translation:
Indeed, I've met with many 
dangerous things.
But I managed to defeat every last
one of them.
Me...

original: And this WarGrowlmon, here!
translation: And this WarGrowlmon, here!

original: Did you call for me... My Tamer?
translation: Did you call for me... My Tamer?

original:
Do whatever you need to do in 
order to stop these two.
We absolutely cannot allow them to
continue any further.
translation:
Do whatever you need to do in 
order to stop these two.
We absolutely cannot allow them to
continue any further.

original:
Understood, my Tamer. 
I will stop them, here and now.
translation:
Understood, my Tamer. 
I will stop them, here and now.

original:
W...What are you talking about?!
You're just messing around, right?!
translation:
W...What are you talking about?!
You're just messing around, right?!

original:
...As I expected.

^P really is the most 
troublesome.
Able to defeat anyone, serious, 
obedient, and also quite smart.
As a Tamer, you are indeed 
the perfect specimen.
translation:
...As I expected.

^P really is the most 
troublesome.
Able to defeat anyone, serious, 
obedient, and also quite smart.
As a Tamer, you are indeed 
the perfect specimen.

original:
Hey, stop messing around, Takuto!
Just what are you doing!?
Attacking us, kidnapping Asuka...
Was that all your doing too?!
translation:
Hey, stop messing around, Takuto!
Just what are you doing!?
Attacking us, kidnapping Asuka...
Was that all your doing too?!

original:
Indeed. But what matters right 
now...
Is that a strong Tamer like you 
is nothing but a danger to Yui.
If you aren't going to be our ally, 
then you should leave us alone.
translation:
Indeed. But what matters right 
now...
Is that a strong Tamer like you 
is nothing but a danger to Yui.
If you aren't going to be our ally, 
then you should leave us alone.

original:
Why would being a strong Tamer
put Yui in danger...?
We've come all this way in order
to find and help you...
translation:
Why would being a strong Tamer
put Yui in danger...?
We've come all this way in order
to find and help you...

original:
Even if I explained it, you still 
wouldn't understand.
More importantly, I don't need your
help.
Rather, your getting in the way is
quite troublesome.
If you continue further, I'll be 
forced to see you as an enemy.
And who knows what may happen 
after that.
translation:
Even if I explained it, you still 
wouldn't understand.
More importantly, I don't need your
help.
Rather, your getting in the way is
quite troublesome.
If you continue further, I'll be 
forced to see you as an enemy.
And who knows what may happen 
after that.

original: Hey, wait, Takuto!?
translation: Hey, wait, Takuto!?

original:
Oh, you've managed to make
it this far...? It's too bad...
This is as far as you'll go, teehee♪
translation:
Oh, you've managed to make
it this far...? It's too bad...
This is as far as you'll go, teehee♪

original:
Hearing Asuka say 'teehee' is 
odd no matter how you look at it.
That...is Asuka... isn't it?
translation:
Hearing Asuka say 'teehee' is 
odd no matter how you look at it.
That...is Asuka... isn't it?

original:
Don't let your guard down, 
^P.
I've got a bad feeling about this...
Considering all that's happened,
something's gotta be up...
translation:
Don't let your guard down, 
^P.
I've got a bad feeling about this...
Considering all that's happened,
something's gotta be up...

original:
I had no idea fighting was so much
fun...
Flames and light across the field,
electricity and ice through the air.
To win over and over, everything 
bursting and spilling apart.
Destroying everything until nothing 
but dust remains...
Isn't it just exhilarating?
translation:
I had no idea fighting was so much
fun...
Flames and light across the field,
electricity and ice through the air.
To win over and over, everything 
bursting and spilling apart.
Destroying everything until nothing 
but dust remains...
Isn't it just exhilarating?

original:
What on earth is she going on 
about...?
Did she eat something weird earlier
or something??
translation:
What on earth is she going on 
about...?
Did she eat something weird earlier
or something??

original:
Acquiring strength... 
gaining power...
Don't you get it? Weak, easily 
breakable things...
Deserve to be broken.
translation:
Acquiring strength... 
gaining power...
Don't you get it? Weak, easily 
breakable things...
Deserve to be broken.

original:
And that's why... I'm gonna go 
ahead and break everyone here♪
translation:
And that's why... I'm gonna go 
ahead and break everyone here♪

original:
What's up with her? "I'll break 
everyone", pah!
The one being broken is you, Asuka!
Just what is going on with all of 
you? First Takuto, now Asuka...
translation:
What's up with her? "I'll break 
everyone", pah!
The one being broken is you, Asuka!
Just what is going on with all of 
you? First Takuto, now Asuka...

original:
...How boring.

When I say power, I mean
powerful Digimon.
This one's just no good... I don't 
need you anymore.
translation:
...How boring.

When I say power, I mean
powerful Digimon.
This one's just no good... I don't 
need you anymore.

original:
Huuuuh!? What's up with you?!

You're abandoning this Digimon? 
Aren't you guys partners!?
translation:
Huuuuh!? What's up with you?!

You're abandoning this Digimon? 
Aren't you guys partners!?

original: Huh... Where... am I?
translation: Huh... Where... am I?

original: Where is my Tamer?
translation: Where is my Tamer?

original:
Unfortunately, it's just us here
right now...
translation:
Unfortunately, it's just us here
right now...

original:
...Where did my Tamer go...?

They promised they'd always stay 
by my side...
translation:
...Where did my Tamer go...?

They promised they'd always stay 
by my side...

original: Hey, where are you going?
translation: Hey, where are you going?

original:
I don't know... But I must find my
Tamer.
Nothing will come of me remaining
here.
translation:
I don't know... But I must find my
Tamer.
Nothing will come of me remaining
here.

original:
I don't get what's going on, but 
we can't just leave things be!
For now, we need to go after 
Asuka!
translation:
I don't get what's going on, but 
we can't just leave things be!
For now, we need to go after 
Asuka!

original:
Hey guys! Welcome to the
Union Room!♪
Though the Tamer Union is gone,
please make yourselves at home!♪
My name is Kernel! People usually
call me 'Kernel The...'
translation:
Hey guys! Welcome to the
Union Room!♪
Though the Tamer Union is gone,
please make yourselves at home!♪
My name is Kernel! People usually
call me 'Kernel The...'

original:
We don't have time for that, and 
we don't plan on sticking around.
We're busy looking for a friend.

Did you happen to see a tough-
looking girl pass by here?
translation:
We don't have time for that, and 
we don't plan on sticking around.
We're busy looking for a friend.

Did you happen to see a tough-
looking girl pass by here?

original:
Ah-ha! I see, I see!♪

Did it happen to be Asuka? I know
her very well!♪
So that means you guys must 
be...
^P and Hiroyuki, am I 
correct?♪
Nice to meet you two at last!♪
translation:
Ah-ha! I see, I see!♪

Did it happen to be Asuka? I know
her very well!♪
So that means you guys must 
be...
^P and Hiroyuki, am I 
correct?♪
Nice to meet you two at last!♪

original:
What's with this guy! What's 
going on this time...
Why can't we ever find someone
who's normal around here?!
translation:
What's with this guy! What's 
going on this time...
Why can't we ever find someone
who's normal around here?!

original:
Ah-ha! Now, now, calm down for
a moment, my friends!♪
Asuka has returned to the Home 
Area!
You two are also quite welcome 
there, you know?!♪
translation:
Ah-ha! Now, now, calm down for
a moment, my friends!♪
Asuka has returned to the Home 
Area!
You two are also quite welcome 
there, you know?!♪

original: Home Area...?
translation: Home Area...?

original:
Indeed! In order for us to create a
new Tamer Union,
We're all gathering together here in
the Home Area!♪
Many Tamers throughout the world
are participating, you know!♪
However, in order to join, each 
Tamer must first prove their worth.
And ^P, it appears you'll
get your chance right now!♪
And that's because-!
translation:
Indeed! In order for us to create a
new Tamer Union,
We're all gathering together here in
the Home Area!♪
Many Tamers throughout the world
are participating, you know!♪
However, in order to join, each 
Tamer must first prove their worth.
And ^P, it appears you'll
get your chance right now!♪
And that's because-!

original:
We've been discovered by the 
Selectors...
And I just so happened to have 
forgotten my Digivice!♪
My apologies, ^P, but 
could you take care of this?♪
translation:
We've been discovered by the 
Selectors...
And I just so happened to have 
forgotten my Digivice!♪
My apologies, ^P, but 
could you take care of this?♪

original:
Digivice detected!
Undercover Tamer discovered!
Digivice detected!
Undercover Tamer discovered!
translation:
Digivice detected!
Undercover Tamer discovered!
Digivice detected!
Undercover Tamer discovered!

original:
Confirm Tamer's ability.
P-Rank potential is 71%.
Confirm Tamer's ability.
P-Rank potential is 71%.
translation:
Confirm Tamer's ability.
P-Rank potential is 71%.
Confirm Tamer's ability.
P-Rank potential is 71%.

original:
Remove limiter!
Remove limiter!
translation:
Remove limiter!
Remove limiter!

original:
Those guys are difficult when they
transform into Monster Mode!♪
Good luck, ^P, 
I'm counting on you!♪
translation:
Those guys are difficult when they
transform into Monster Mode!♪
Good luck, ^P, 
I'm counting on you!♪

original:
Amazing, ^P! 
Absolutely magnificent!♪
You simply must join our cause!♪

That's right! I need to give you our 
DigiPort Address!♪
Our wonderful Home Area, 
you see...
It's on Graphics Board Continent!♪
translation:
Amazing, ^P! 
Absolutely magnificent!♪
You simply must join our cause!♪

That's right! I need to give you our 
DigiPort Address!♪
Our wonderful Home Area, 
you see...
It's on Graphics Board Continent!♪

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Task North Address
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Task North Address

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
East City Key
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
East City Key

original:
Graphics Board Continent has four
areas and four cities.♪
In those four cities are four 
champions protecting their title.
If you defeat all four, the
colosseum will allow you entry...
Into a competition to decide the 
top Tamer in the Digital World...
That is what is known as the 
World Championship!♪
What I just gave you is the address
to Graphics Board Continent...
As well the key to the first city,
East City!
Beat the champion there, and you
can move onto the next city!♪
translation:
Graphics Board Continent has four
areas and four cities.♪
In those four cities are four 
champions protecting their title.
If you defeat all four, the
colosseum will allow you entry...
Into a competition to decide the 
top Tamer in the Digital World...
That is what is known as the 
World Championship!♪
What I just gave you is the address
to Graphics Board Continent...
As well the key to the first city,
East City!
Beat the champion there, and you
can move onto the next city!♪

original:
Defeat? Colosseum? 
Championship...??
What's with that carefree attitude 
you've got??
If you're gathering Tamers, then
shouldn't you stop the Selectors!?
translation:
Defeat? Colosseum? 
Championship...??
What's with that carefree attitude 
you've got??
If you're gathering Tamers, then
shouldn't you stop the Selectors!?

original:
My, my, you just don't understand,
my dear Hiroyuki!♪
In order to stand even a chance
against the Selectors,
We need Tamers of Silver or
preferrably higher rank!♪
There's no point in gathering
weak Tamers, you know!♪
And that's where the 
DigiColosseum comes into play!
We were able to restore it using
old leftover data!♪
Now, thanks to that, the Tamer
ranking system has been revived!
Using that, we can measure a 
Tamer's strength and potential!
It's all for the sake of the new 
Tamer Union's victory♪
translation:
My, my, you just don't understand,
my dear Hiroyuki!♪
In order to stand even a chance
against the Selectors,
We need Tamers of Silver or
preferrably higher rank!♪
There's no point in gathering
weak Tamers, you know!♪
And that's where the 
DigiColosseum comes into play!
We were able to restore it using
old leftover data!♪
Now, thanks to that, the Tamer
ranking system has been revived!
Using that, we can measure a 
Tamer's strength and potential!
It's all for the sake of the new 
Tamer Union's victory♪

original:
Now then, I shall be awaiting you 
at Graphics Board Continent!
Farewell, my friends!♪
translation:
Now then, I shall be awaiting you 
at Graphics Board Continent!
Farewell, my friends!♪

original:
What on earth was that about...?

Both he, and what he spoke about
worry me a bit...
I guess we should check out this 
new address back at the DigiBase!
translation:
What on earth was that about...?

Both he, and what he spoke about
worry me a bit...
I guess we should check out this 
new address back at the DigiBase!

original:
Great job, ^P!

We'll start investigating this 
Graphics Board Continent address!
translation:
Great job, ^P!

We'll start investigating this 
Graphics Board Continent address!

original:
More importantly, about that 
Kernel guy...
Don't you think there was 
something... off about him?
translation:
More importantly, about that 
Kernel guy...
Don't you think there was 
something... off about him?

original:
Wasn't he fighting against the 
Selectors too, though?
Even if he is a bit strange, I don't 
think he's any threat to us...
translation:
Wasn't he fighting against the 
Selectors too, though?
Even if he is a bit strange, I don't 
think he's any threat to us...

original:
Enemy or not, there's something
about him that creeps me out!
It felt like he didn't truly mean
anything he was saying...
All the while giving that polite smile.
It was totally weird, wasn't it?!
translation:
Enemy or not, there's something
about him that creeps me out!
It felt like he didn't truly mean
anything he was saying...
All the while giving that polite smile.
It was totally weird, wasn't it?!

original:
However, I am interested in this
Graphics Board Continent...
It sounded like there were quite a
few Tamers there.
If what he was saying is true...

Does that mean Asuka, Yui and 
Takuto are there, too?
translation:
However, I am interested in this
Graphics Board Continent...
It sounded like there were quite a
few Tamers there.
If what he was saying is true...

Does that mean Asuka, Yui and 
Takuto are there, too?

original:
We'll do our best to investigate 
things further.
Can you wait a little longer?
translation:
We'll do our best to investigate 
things further.
Can you wait a little longer?

original:
Yeah, that's alright with us.

In the meantime, why don't we do
some Quests?
We probably won't get a chance to
do more for a little while.
translation:
Yeah, that's alright with us.

In the meantime, why don't we do
some Quests?
We probably won't get a chance to
do more for a little while.

original:
Then why don't you go check the
Quest PC?
translation:
Then why don't you go check the
Quest PC?

original:
Oh, ^P! Great timing!

I have something I'd like to discuss
with you, if you don't mind?
translation:
Oh, ^P! Great timing!

I have something I'd like to discuss
with you, if you don't mind?

original:
Gatomon has checked the Graphics
Board Continent address.
It appears to be on a different
server.
translation:
Gatomon has checked the Graphics
Board Continent address.
It appears to be on a different
server.

original: A different... server...?
translation: A different... server...?

original:
Well, to put it simply... it's like a
different world.
The Digital World itself exists 
within the Network, 
so the more servers that are 
connected, the larger it grows.
translation:
Well, to put it simply... it's like a
different world.
The Digital World itself exists 
within the Network, 
so the more servers that are 
connected, the larger it grows.

original:
A different world...?
That sounds really amazing...
What kind of place is Graphics
Board Continent, anyway?
translation:
A different world...?
That sounds really amazing...
What kind of place is Graphics
Board Continent, anyway?

original:
It appears to have copied data
from a range of different servers.
It contains geographical data 
found in the Digital World...
And has built itself off that data, 
with small changes here and there.
We're not picking up any detectable
traps on our scans.
On top of that, there are no 
signs of any Selectors,
So at the very least, it doesn't 
seem to be a Selector trap.
translation:
It appears to have copied data
from a range of different servers.
It contains geographical data 
found in the Digital World...
And has built itself off that data, 
with small changes here and there.
We're not picking up any detectable
traps on our scans.
On top of that, there are no 
signs of any Selectors,
So at the very least, it doesn't 
seem to be a Selector trap.

original:
So there won't be any nasty 
surprises waiting for us?
translation:
So there won't be any nasty 
surprises waiting for us?

original:
I can't guarantee that. We really 
don't have enough information.
Originally, that server was merely a
copy of ours,
But when you compare data size, 
it's much bigger than here.
It's so big and vast that anything
could be hidden there...
It's dangerous for you, Hiroyuki,
so why don't you stay here?
translation:
I can't guarantee that. We really 
don't have enough information.
Originally, that server was merely a
copy of ours,
But when you compare data size, 
it's much bigger than here.
It's so big and vast that anything
could be hidden there...
It's dangerous for you, Hiroyuki,
so why don't you stay here?

original:
Really? Well, if you say so... 
Good luck, ^P! Be careful!
translation:
Really? Well, if you say so... 
Good luck, ^P! Be careful!

original:
I'm sure whatever happens, 
^P can handle it.
After all, they've protected us
this entire time, right?
translation:
I'm sure whatever happens, 
^P can handle it.
After all, they've protected us
this entire time, right?

original: Hm? Are you a newbie Tamer...?
translation: Hm? Are you a newbie Tamer...?

original:
I see. It appears you aren't very
knowledgeable yet.
That's quite convenient for me.

For you see, I was once feared as
the former Tamer King...
And I shall teach you the 
unforgiving life of a Tamer!
translation:
I see. It appears you aren't very
knowledgeable yet.
That's quite convenient for me.

For you see, I was once feared as
the former Tamer King...
And I shall teach you the 
unforgiving life of a Tamer!

original:
Y-you're the one who's 
unforgiving!
W-Why don't you just tone 
things down a little!?
Get out of here!
translation:
Y-you're the one who's 
unforgiving!
W-Why don't you just tone 
things down a little!?
Get out of here!

original:
Argh, fine! I'll allow you to pass
through here!
Grrr, and I was once the fearsome
Tamer King,
Now I'm falling behind a bunch of
pathetic children...!
translation:
Argh, fine! I'll allow you to pass
through here!
Grrr, and I was once the fearsome
Tamer King,
Now I'm falling behind a bunch of
pathetic children...!

original:
Hm? You know those pathetic kids?

They totally blasted through this
area with ease, and are now the
Local Champions of South City, in
Graphics Board South just nearby.
translation:
Hm? You know those pathetic kids?

They totally blasted through this
area with ease, and are now the
Local Champions of South City, in
Graphics Board South just nearby.

original:
If you continue on at this rate, you'll
probably fight them, too.
They're absurdly strong, those 
kids. Almost unfairly powerful.
They were strong enough to shock 
even me, the Tamer King.
Well, I mean I guess you garnered 
the same reaction from me.
It's possible you may be able to win
against them... good luck.
translation:
If you continue on at this rate, you'll
probably fight them, too.
They're absurdly strong, those 
kids. Almost unfairly powerful.
They were strong enough to shock 
even me, the Tamer King.
Well, I mean I guess you garnered 
the same reaction from me.
It's possible you may be able to win
against them... good luck.

original:
What's that, you bastard?! Say 
that one more time, I dare you!
translation:
What's that, you bastard?! Say 
that one more time, I dare you!

original:
Like I said, if you really wanna go
off and fight, then do it yourself!
Get your giant bony ass outta 
here, SkullBaluchimon!
Uhyohyohyohyo...!
translation:
Like I said, if you really wanna go
off and fight, then do it yourself!
Get your giant bony ass outta 
here, SkullBaluchimon!
Uhyohyohyohyo...!

original:
Just who do you think you are,
screwing with me like that?!
translation:
Just who do you think you are,
screwing with me like that?!

original:
Look, we've got a guest.
Off you go, I'll watch over you.
You can always yell out 'Help me!' 
if things get too tough for you!
Uhyohyohyohyo...!
translation:
Look, we've got a guest.
Off you go, I'll watch over you.
You can always yell out 'Help me!' 
if things get too tough for you!
Uhyohyohyohyo...!

original:
I don't need your help anyway, so
just stay out of my way.
translation:
I don't need your help anyway, so
just stay out of my way.

original:
You bet I'll stay back and watch,
little SkullBaluchimon.
Watch your pathetic loss, that is♪
Uhyohyohyohyo...!
translation:
You bet I'll stay back and watch,
little SkullBaluchimon.
Watch your pathetic loss, that is♪
Uhyohyohyohyo...!

original:
Remember this, you idiot...

Once I'm done with this kid, you're
next!
translation:
Remember this, you idiot...

Once I'm done with this kid, you're
next!

original:
Oh nooo, you lost... 
Isn't that just too baaad...
Uhyohyohyohyo...!
translation:
Oh nooo, you lost... 
Isn't that just too baaad...
Uhyohyohyohyo...!

original:
Damn it...!
I can't do this anymore!
translation:
Damn it...!
I can't do this anymore!

original:
Well, I saw it coming. You
were too conceited, after all.
This little SkullBaluchimon is 
simply a replacement partner.
If my real partner was here...

We'd be able to defeat you in but
a single strike, you know?
translation:
Well, I saw it coming. You
were too conceited, after all.
This little SkullBaluchimon is 
simply a replacement partner.
If my real partner was here...

We'd be able to defeat you in but
a single strike, you know?

original:
Aren't you the one who's gotten 
too full of himself, Bibir...?
translation:
Aren't you the one who's gotten 
too full of himself, Bibir...?

original:
I see you're still a good-for-nothing
piece of trash.
Keep going like that, and you'll be
getting a personal beating from me.
translation:
I see you're still a good-for-nothing
piece of trash.
Keep going like that, and you'll be
getting a personal beating from me.

original:
Uhyohyohyohyo...!
It's been forever!
Did you finally find that present I
left for you?
translation:
Uhyohyohyohyo...!
It's been forever!
Did you finally find that present I
left for you?

original:
Shut your mouth, fool.

You just step aside and keep hold
of that Digivice of yours.
translation:
Shut your mouth, fool.

You just step aside and keep hold
of that Digivice of yours.

original:
Now that's the little Devi that I
know!
Hey, here's an idea. Why don't
we show that Tamer over there...
Just how powerful of a team we
can be!
It'll be a revenge match for
SkullBaluchimon!
Uhyohyohyohyo...!
translation:
Now that's the little Devi that I
know!
Hey, here's an idea. Why don't
we show that Tamer over there...
Just how powerful of a team we
can be!
It'll be a revenge match for
SkullBaluchimon!
Uhyohyohyohyo...!

original:
A revenge match...? Enough
screwing around...
You're the one who tripped up
SkullBaluchimon in the end, after all!
translation:
A revenge match...? Enough
screwing around...
You're the one who tripped up
SkullBaluchimon in the end, after all!

original:
Well... seeing as I wouldn't go as 
far as to call us friends now... 
Could you just go along with 
this for a little bit?
translation:
Well... seeing as I wouldn't go as 
far as to call us friends now... 
Could you just go along with 
this for a little bit?

original:
Look at you, acting all high and
mighty, but you still couldn't win!
Uhyohyohyohyo...!
translation:
Look at you, acting all high and
mighty, but you still couldn't win!
Uhyohyohyohyo...!

original:
What are you doing, you fool?! Isn't
that the HP Charge?!
Pffffhahahaha...!
translation:
What are you doing, you fool?! Isn't
that the HP Charge?!
Pffffhahahaha...!

original:
Let's go, one more round! I can 
feel it all coming back to me!
This time will be the real deal! 
The deciding match!
translation:
Let's go, one more round! I can 
feel it all coming back to me!
This time will be the real deal! 
The deciding match!

original:
Oh yeah!

Defeating a Tamer like this isn't
satisfiying!
With this momentum, I'm sure we
can defeat the Local Champion!
translation:
Oh yeah!

Defeating a Tamer like this isn't
satisfiying!
With this momentum, I'm sure we
can defeat the Local Champion!

original:
Uhyohyohyohyo...!♪

That's the spirit, little Devi!
Let's do this!
You can do it, right? Right?!
Let's finish this in a single strike!
translation:
Uhyohyohyohyo...!♪

That's the spirit, little Devi!
Let's do this!
You can do it, right? Right?!
Let's finish this in a single strike!

original:
...What's up with you noisy punks?

You're so weak, you're not even 
worth my time.
translation:
...What's up with you noisy punks?

You're so weak, you're not even 
worth my time.

original:
Uhyo...hyohyohyohyo... ...♪
Damn it..... how...?
translation:
Uhyo...hyohyohyohyo... ...♪
Damn it..... how...?

original:
Pffha... haha... ha...
We were utterly destroyed...
translation:
Pffha... haha... ha...
We were utterly destroyed...

original:
Despite losing, you're still laughing.
You guys are insane...
translation:
Despite losing, you're still laughing.
You guys are insane...

original:
Once you've lost, you can feel free
to laugh all you want, too.
translation:
Once you've lost, you can feel free
to laugh all you want, too.

original:
Even if one loses, they still
somehow enjoy it.
Maybe because they have a partner
they can grow stronger with, huh?
I won't ever forget this feeling.
translation:
Even if one loses, they still
somehow enjoy it.
Maybe because they have a partner
they can grow stronger with, huh?
I won't ever forget this feeling.

original:
Now then, please leave me.
Play time's over.
translation:
Now then, please leave me.
Play time's over.

original:
You're no longer of any use to me.

As am I no longer any use to you,
either, right?
After all...

We are no longer the Champions of 
this town.
translation:
You're no longer of any use to me.

As am I no longer any use to you,
either, right?
After all...

We are no longer the Champions of 
this town.

original:
If you have any plan of continuing
onwards to the next town,
You're going to need this key.

Use it to enter South City. That's 
where the next Local Champion is.
translation:
If you have any plan of continuing
onwards to the next town,
You're going to need this key.

Use it to enter South City. That's 
where the next Local Champion is.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i

original:
As Local Champion, you're now 
free to stay here as you wish.
Since you are this... city's new...
lo...cal... Cham...

pi... on...
translation:
As Local Champion, you're now 
free to stay here as you wish.
Since you are this... city's new...
lo...cal... Cham...

pi... on...

original:
Huh...?

Hey, ^P... Where are we?
translation:
Huh...?

Hey, ^P... Where are we?

original: ASUKAAAA!
translation: ASUKAAAA!

original:
Pfffffhahahaha...!
You finally woke up!
I never expected you'd be the 
Local Champion, I was shocked!
I ended up letting my guard down
and got totally defeated by you!
translation:
Pfffffhahahaha...!
You finally woke up!
I never expected you'd be the 
Local Champion, I was shocked!
I ended up letting my guard down
and got totally defeated by you!

original: Who are you...?
translation: Who are you...?

original:
What's with you, Little Devi? 
Do you know this Champion?
translation:
What's with you, Little Devi? 
Do you know this Champion?

original:
Little Devi...? Could you be... 
THAT Little Devi?!
translation:
Little Devi...? Could you be... 
THAT Little Devi?!

original:
That's right, it's me!

I've been looking for the red 
Digimon that kidnapped you!
Along the way I ran into this super
uncool partner, here!
translation:
That's right, it's me!

I've been looking for the red 
Digimon that kidnapped you!
Along the way I ran into this super
uncool partner, here!

original:
Kidnapped...?

I remember talking to a strange 
Digimon back in Palette Amazon...
Huh...? What happened after
that, again...? It's all fuzzy...
translation:
Kidnapped...?

I remember talking to a strange 
Digimon back in Palette Amazon...
Huh...? What happened after
that, again...? It's all fuzzy...
